CustomField.description: A flag used to control whether or not to create a Credit Memo Document (PDF, RTF, DOC, or DOCX) as part of Invoice Run. Documents will not be generated if this flag is unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A flag used to control whether or not to create a Credit Memo Document (PDF, RTF, DOC, or DOCX) as part of Invoice Run. Documents will not be generated if this flag is unchecked.
CustomField.label: GenerateCreditMemoDocuments
